mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY.CATEGORY_ID categoryId, CATEGORY.CATEGORY_NAME categoryName, CATEGORY.DESCRIPTION description, IMAGE.IMAGE_FILE imgFile FROM BRN_CATEGORY CATEGORY, BRN_IMAGE IMAGE WHERE CATEGORY.IMAGE_ID = IMAGE.IMAGE_ID

SELECT PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME productName, IMAGE.IMAGE_FILE imgFileMain, PRODUCT.UNIT_PRICE unitPrice, PRODUCT.UNIT unit, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID productId FROM BRN_PRODUCT as PRODUCT LEFT JOIN BRN_IMAGE as IMAGE ON PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID = IMAGE.ID AND IMAGE.SEQ =1
